DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether behavioral lifestyle intervention use mobile smart phone technology self-monitoring lead great improvement diabetes outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator conduct pilot randomize control clinical trial examine feasibility preliminary efficacy behavioral lifestyle intervention weight , glycemic control , vascular inflammatory marker outcome . A total 26 overweight obese patient type 2 diabetes recruit underserved minority community health center Houston , TX . They randomly assign one three group : 1 ) Behavior intervention smart phone base self-monitoring , 2 ) Behavior intervention paper diary base self-monitoring , 3 ) Usual care group . Both Mobile Paper group receive total 11 group session 1 individual session 6-month intervention . Mobile group receive android-based smart phone two application load help record diet , physical activity , weight , blood glucose , paper group use paper diary recording .
